text:
Title: Expats (The Expats or The Expatriates)

Genre: Drama
Language: English
Release year: 2023
Directed by: Lulu Wang
Starring: Nicole Kidman as Margaret, Sarayu Blue as Hilary Starr, Ji-young Yoo as Mercy, Brian Tee as Clarke, Tiana Gowen as Daisy Woo, Bodhi del Rosario as Philip Woo, Amelyn Pardenilla as Puri, Jack Huston as David Starr, Leon Masuda as Jerry Masuda, Blessing Mokgohloa as Pastor Alan, Jennifer Beveridge as Tilda, Valerie Yu as Morgan, and many others.

Plot summary: Three women find themselves in Hong Kong after a tragic event that connects them. They are expatriates trying to navigate their way through the crowded city.

Production information:
Executive producers: Kimi Lee, Alice Bell, Janice Y.K. Lee, and Melanie Marnich.
Costume design: Malgosia Turzanska.

Availability: IMDb rating - 7.5/10 based on 85 user reviews. Douban rating â€“ no ratings yet. Released in September 8, 2023 at the Toronto International Film Festival, with a wider release scheduled for January 26, 2024 in the United States.
